channel.title: Moperscape help
channel.description:
character-username = character-password =
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3216 character-posy = 3418 character-rights = 3 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20060028 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 10424
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 1 0 character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 1 0 character-skill = 3 1 0 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS]
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]

[EOF]
i found the above txt doc. in the character folder what is it for?

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

np, yeah… just have any problems ask…

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @bballer bballer
item.description:
@bballer wrote:

ok thx uve been a real help so far

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

you can… but just change rights to 2 and then find the code for rune picks or whatever you want… then type ::item and then the number.

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @bballer bballer
item.description:
@bballer wrote:

can i change the code into something else once i get it like if i get a bronze pick could i change into rune pick or 500 rune picks?

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

nothing… jsut log into moparscape and get items yourself…

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @bballer bballer
item.description:
@bballer wrote:

what about items and bank what do i put there plz?

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

ex…to change lvls change the last numbers to the xp…

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 1 whatever here…
character-skill = 1 1 26175000
character-skill = 2 1 12735000
character-skill = 3 1 53551155
character-skill = 4 1 10915000

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @bballer bballer
item.description:
@bballer wrote:

DAWIGG:

you can change xp on skills…just save compile,run…

how do i do this?

Read full topic

item.title: Moperscape help
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

well you can change your rights to 2 to become a admin ect… you can change xp on skills…just save compile,run…

Read full topic
